mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YJ_PANORAMA WHERE MEM_NO = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YJ_PLAN WHERE MEM_NO = #{value}

SELECT PANO_NO, MEM_NO, PANO_TITLE, PANO_LIKE, PANO_REGDATE, PANO_DAY_NO, PANO_DAY_DATE, PANO_DAY_LOCA, PANO_DAY_MEMO FROM ( SELECT CEILING((@RNUM := @RNUM + 1)/8) AS RN, A.PANO_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PANO_TITLE, A.PANO_LIKE, DATE_FORMAT(A.PANO_REGDATE, '%y.%c.%d') PANO_REGDATE, B.PANO_DAY_NO, B.PANO_DAY_DATE, B.PANO_DAY_LOCA, B.PANO_DAY_MEMO FROM YJ_PANORAMA A, YJ_PANO_DAY B, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE A.MEM_NO = #{userNo} AND A.PANO_NO = B.PANO_NO AND B.PANO_DAY_DATE = 1 ORDER BY A.PANO_NO DESC
) A WHERE RN = #{currPage}

SELECT RN, PLAN_NO, MEM_NO, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_LIKE_CNT, CONTENTID, FIRSTIMAGE, PLACE_TITLE FROM (SELECT CEILING((@RNUM := @RNUM + 1)/8) AS RN, A.PLAN_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PLAN_TITLE, A.PLAN_LIKE_CNT, B.CONTENTID, B.FIRSTIMAGE, B.PLACE_TITLE FROM YJ_PLAN A, (SELECT A.CONTENTID, A.PLAN_NO, C.FIRSTIMAGE, C.TITLE PLACE_TITLE FROM YJ_PLAN_DAY A, (SELECT MIN(PLAN_DAY_NO) PLAN_DAY_NO FROM YJ_PLAN_DAY GROUP BY PLAN_NO) B, YJ_PLACE C WHERE A.PLAN_DAY_NO = B.PLAN_DAY_NO AND A.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID) B, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE A.MEM_NO = #{userNo} AND A.PLAN_NO = B.PLAN_NO ORDER BY A.PLAN_NO DESC ) A WHERE RN = #{currPage}
